net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Get Passed Arguments -->
[h:varsFromStrProp(arg(0))]

[h:returnData = ""]

<!-- Get Feats -->
[H: tBurstFire = getStrProp(Feats, "BurstFire")]
[H: tRapidShot = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidShot")]

[H, SWITCH(RDattack), CODE:
	case 1 : {
		[H, if((rof=="A"||rof=="S/A") ), CODE:{
		[H:Datk=Datk-5]
		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Auto-Fire"]}
		]};
	case 2 : {
		[H, if(tBurstFire &&(rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")), CODE:{
		[H:Datk=Datk-5]
		[H:Ddmgdie=Ddmgdie+2]
		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Burst Fire"]}
		]};
	case 3 : {
		[H, if(tRapidShot), CODE:{
		[H:Datk=Datk-2]
		[H:Ddmgdie=Ddmgdie+1]
		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Rapid Shot"]}
		]};
	default: {[H:Datk=Datk]};
]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Datk", Datk)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Doption", Doption)]
[h:macro.return=returnData]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: VRDsend

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:

[H, SWITCH(RTattack), CODE:
	case 1 : {
		[H, if((rof=="A"||rof=="S/A") ), CODE:{
		[H:Tatk=Tatk-5]
		[H:TOption=TOption+ " Auto-Fire"]}
		]};
	case 2 : {

		[H:Tatk=Tatk-5]
		[H:Tdmgdie=Tdmgdie+2]
		[H:TOption=TOption+ " Burst Fire"]}

	case 3 : {[H, if(tRapidShot), CODE:{

]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Ask the user to select one of the weapons. --> [H: wpnList = json.toList(WeaponLibrary)] [H: status = input( "wpnNum | " + wpnList + " | Select Weapon | LIST | SELECT = " + getStrProp(Private, "LastAttackWeapon", 0), "tempBonusHit | 0 | Temp. Hit Bonus | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "tempBonusDmg | 0 | Temp. Dmg Bonus | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "Xattack | Single, Double, Triple | # of Attacks | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastXattackTask", 0), "Rattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot, Deadeye | Ranged Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRattackTask", 0), "RDattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Double Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRDattackTask", 0), "RTattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Triple Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRTattackTask", 0) )] [H: abort(status)]
<!-- Get Feats --> [H: tDoubleAttack = getStrProp(Feats, "DoubleAttack")] [H: tTripleAttack = getStrProp(Feats, "TripleAttack")] [H: tBurstFire = getStrProp(Feats, "BurstFire")] [H: tRapidShot = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidShot")] [H: tDeadeye = getStrProp(Feats, "Deadeye")]
<!-- Get Weapon Stats --> [H: weapon = ""] [H: weaponName = listGet(wpnList, wpnNum)] [H, IF(json.isEmpty(weapon)): weapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, weaponName)] [H: name = json.get(weapon, "Name")] [H: dmgDice = json.get(weapon, "DmgDice")] [H: dmgMulti = json.get(weapon, "DmgMulti")] [H: dmgType = json.get(weapon, "DmgType")] [H: tripleCrit = json.get(weapon, "TripleCrit")] [H: rof = json.get(weapon, "ROF")] [H: atk = json.get(weapon, "Atk")] [H: dmg = json.get(weapon, "Dmg")] [H: usestat=IntBonus]
<!-- Save the selections for next time --> [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastAttackWeapon", wpnNum)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastXattackTask", Xattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRattackTask", Rattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRDattackTask", RDattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRTattackTask", RTattack)]
[h:DisplayList=""] [h:OHsendList=""] [h:MDsendList=""] [h:MTsendList=""] [h:RDsendList=""] [h:RTsendList=""] [H: Option=""] [H: DOption=""] [H: TOption=""] [H: amt=0] [H, if(atk):atk=atk;atk=0] [H: Datk=atk] [H: Tatk=atk] [H: dmgdie=listGet(stringToList(DmgDice,"d"), 0)] [H: Ddmgdie=dmgdie] [H: Tdmgdie=dmgdie] [H: dmgdietype=listGet(stringToList(DmgDice,"d"), 1)] [H: Ddmgdietype=dmgdietype] [H: Tdmgdietype=dmgdietype]
<!-- Single, Double, Triple Attack --> [H, SWITCH(Xattack), CODE: case 0 : { [H:amt=0] [H:Option="Single Attack"] }; case 1 : {[H, if(tDoubleAttack), CODE:{ [H:amt=1] [H:atk=atk-5] [H:Datk=Datk-5] [H:Tatk=Tatk-5] [H:Option="Double Attack"] [H:DOption="Double Attack"]} ]}; case 2 :{[H, if(tTripleAttack), CODE:{ [H:amt=2] [H:atk=atk-10] [H:Datk=Datk-10] [H:Tatk=Tatk-10] [H:Option="Triple Attack"] [H:DOption="Triple Attack"] [H:TOption="Triple Attack"]} ]}; ]
<!-- Rattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot, Deadeye --> [H, SWITCH(Rattack), CODE: case 1 : {[H, if((rof=="A"||rof=="S/A") ), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:Option=Option+ " Auto-Fire"]} ]}; case 2 : {[H, if(tBurstFire &&(rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+2] [H:Option=Option+ " Burst Fire"]} ]}; case 3 : {[H, if(tRapidShot && (rof=="S"||rof=="S/A")), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-2] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Rapid Shot"]} ]}; case 4 : {[H, if(tDeadeye), CODE:{ [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Deadeye"]} ]}; default: {[H:atk=atk]}; ]
<!-- Double Attack RDattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RDattack&&Xattack>=1), CODE:{ [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Datk", Datk)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "DOption", DOption)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "RDattack", RDattack)] [VRDsend(RDsendList)] [h:RDProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RDProperties)] }]
<!-- Triple Attack RTattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RTattack && Xattack>=2), CODE:{ [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tdmgdie", Tdmgdie)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tatk", Tatk)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "TOption", TOption)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "RTattack", RTattack)] [VRTsend(RTsendList)] [h:RTProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RTProperties)] }]
<!-- Setup Primary attack display variables --> [h:dmgDice=dmgdie +"d"+ dmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "name", name)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", dmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "DmgMulti", dmgMulti)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tripleCrit", tripleCrit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "usestat", usestat)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "atk", atk)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusHit", tempBonusHit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", option)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmg", dmg)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgType", dmgType)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusDmg", tempBonusDmg)]
[R, if(amt>=0):VDisplayAttack(DisplayList)]
[H, if(amt>=1), CODE:{ [h: DdmgDice=Ddmgdie +"d"+ Ddmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", DdmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", Doption)]}] [R, if(amt>=1):VDisplayAttack(DisplayList)] [H ,if(amt>=2), CODE:{ [h: TdmgDice=Tdmgdie +"d"+ Tdmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", TdmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", Toption)]}] [R, if(amt>=2):VDisplayAttack(DisplayList)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Attack

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: success = input( "HPt|0|# Hit Points| TEXT | WIDTH=4", "HPtype|Healing, Damage, Ion Damage|Change Type|RADIO|SELECT=1", "tokenType|PC, NPC|Token Type|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT=" + if(isPC(), 0, 1), "junk|NPC=Limited chat info & coarse HP bar|NOTE:|LABEL" )] [H: abort(success)] [H: tokenType = if(tokenType == 1, "NPC", "PC")] [H: damage = if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2, 1, 0)] [H: HPt = if(HPtype == 0, abs(HPt), if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2, -1 * abs(HPt), 0))] [H: TempHP = TempHP + (damage*HPt)] [H: HPChange = if((HPt < 0), if(TempHP > 0, 0, TempHP ), HPt)] [H, if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2), CODE:{ [H, if(abs(HPChange) > CurrSR), CODE:{ [H: HPChange = HPChange + CurrSR + DR] [H, if(HPChange > 0): HPChange = 0] [H: CurrSR = CurrSR - 5] [H, if(CurrSR <= 0): CurrSR = 0] }; { [H:HPChange=0] };] }] [H, If(HPtype == 2), CODE:{ [H: FullIon = HPChange * -1] {HPChange} [H: HPChange = floor(HPChange * 0.5)] }; {[H: FullIon = 0]};] [H: CurrentHP = min(CurrentHP + HPChange,MaxHP)] [H: TempHP = max(0,TempHP)] [H, if(CurrentHP <0):CurrentHP=0] [H: TCondition = listFind(getLibProperty("CONDITION_LIST"), Condition)] [H: HPtest=abs(HPChange)] [H, if((HPtest >= Threshold) && (HPtype == 1)): TCondition = TCondition + 1] [H, if((CurrentHP == 0) && (HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2)): TCondition = 5] [H, if((CurrentHP == 0) && (HPtype == 1) && (HPtest >= Threshold)): TCondition = 6] [H, if((FullIon >= Threshold) && (HPtype == 2)): TCondition = TCondition + 2] [MACRO("handleTokenHPStates@Lib:ZaroVehicles"):TCondition]
[R: if(HPt < 1, "", "Gained ")][R: HPChange ] hitpoints! [R: if(tokenType == "PC", "  " + CurrentHP + " / " + MaxHP + " Hitpoints. " + CurrSR + " / "+ SR + " Shield.", "")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: HPChange

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [MACRO("confirmDialog@Lib:Zaro"):""] [H: weaponName = macro.args] [H: WeaponLibrary = json.remove(WeaponLibrary, weaponName)] Equipment: Deleted {weaponName}.

<!-- Save the selected weapon task for next time --> [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastWeaponTask", choice)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: weaponName = macro.args] [H: weapon = ""] [H: GROUP = getLibProperty("WEAPON_GROUP")] [H: weapon = if(weaponName=="newRangedWeapon", getLibProperty("DEFAULT_RANGED_WEAPON", "Lib:ZaroVehicles"), weapon)] [H, IF(json.isEmpty(weapon)): weapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, weaponName)] [H: name = json.get(weapon, "Name")] [H: description = json.get(weapon, "Description")] [H: dmgDice = json.get(weapon, "DmgDice")] [H: dmgMulti = json.get(weapon, "DmgMulti")] [H: tripleCrit = json.get(weapon, "TripleCrit")] [H: dmgType = json.get(weapon, "DmgType")] [H: rof = json.get(weapon, "ROF")] [H: atk = json.get(weapon, "Atk")] [H: dmg = json.get(weapon, "Dmg")] [H: range = json.get(weapon, "Range")] [H: status = input( "name | " + name + " | Weapon's nickname / short name) | TEXT | WIDTH=25", "description | " + description + " | Weapon's description / long name | TEXT | WIDTH=25", "dmgDice | " + dmgDice + " | Damage Dice | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "dmgMulti | " + dmgMulti + " | Damage Multiplier | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "tripleCrit | " + tripleCrit + " | Triple Crit | CHECK", "dmgType | " + dmgType + " | Damage Type | TEXT | WIDTH=10", "rof | S, A, S/A |RoF| LIST |SELECT=1 VALUE=STRING", "atk | " + atk + " | Bonus to Hit | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "dmg | " + dmg + " | Bonus, Damage (Misc) | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "range | " + range + " | Range | TEXT | WIDTH=4" )] [H: abort(status)] [H: weapon = json.set(weapon, "Name", name, "Description", description, "DmgDice", dmgDice, "DmgMulti", dmgMulti, "TripleCrit", tripleCrit, "DmgType", dmgType, "ROF",rof, "Atk", atk, "Dmg", dmg, "Range", range )] [H: WeaponLibrary = json.set(WeaponLibrary, name, weapon)] Equipment: Updated {name}.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: editRangedItem

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: wpnList = json.toList(WeaponLibrary)] [H: wpnList = listInsert(wpnList, 0, "--")] [H: status = input( "newMainNum | " + wpnList + " | Choose main weapon | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Main), "newOffhandNum | " + wpnList + " | Choose secondary weapon | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Offhand), "newImp1Num | " + wpnList + " | Choose implement #1 | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Implement1), "newImp2Num | " + wpnList + " | Choose implement #2 | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Implement2), "newImp3Num | " + wpnList + " | Choose implement #3 | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Implement3), "newImp4Num | " + wpnList + " | Choose implement #4 | LIST | SELECT=" + listFind(wpnList, Implement4) )] [H: abort(status)] [H: Main = listGet(wpnList, newMainNum)] [H: Offhand = listGet(wpnList, newOffhandNum)] [H: Implement1 = listGet(wpnList, newImp1Num)] [H: Implement2 = listGet(wpnList, newImp2Num)] [H: Implement3 = listGet(wpnList, newImp3Num)] [H: Implement4 = listGet(wpnList, newImp4Num)] Equipment: Equipped new gear.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: equipWeapons

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Veggiesama's editWeapons macro, MapTool B50 -->
<!-- Build the list of weapon names. --> [H: wpnList = json.toList(WeaponLibrary)] [H: wpnList = listAppend(wpnList, "Add New Ranged Weapon")]
<!-- Ask the user to select one of the weapons. --> [H: status = input( "wpnNum | " + wpnList + " | Select item | LIST | SELECT = " + getStrProp(Private, "LastEditWeapon", 0), "delete | 0 | Delete item instead? | CHECK" )] [H: abort(status)]
<!-- Save the selected weapon for next time --> [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastEditWeapon", wpnNum)]
<!-- listCount()-1 is "Add New Ranged Weapon" --> <!-- Everything else is a previously created item. --> [H: macro = ""] [H: macro = if(wpnNum == (listCount(wpnList)-1), "addNewRangedWeapon", macro)] [H: macro = if(wpnNum < (listCount(wpnList)-1), "editRangedItem", macro)] [H: macro = if(delete && (wpnNum < (listCount(wpnList)-1)), "deleteItem", macro)] [H: weaponName = listGet(wpnList, wpnNum)] [MACRO(macro + "@Lib:ZaroVehicles"):weaponName]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: editWeapons

<!-- listCount()-1 is "Add New Melee Weapon" --> <!-- listCount()-2 is "Add New Ranged Weapon" --> <!-- listCount()-3 is "Add New Implement" --> <!-- Everything else is a previously created item. --> [H: macro = ""] [H: macro = if(wpnNum == (listCount(wpnList)-1), "addNewMeleeWeapon", macro)] [H: macro = if(wpnNum == (listCount(wpnList)-2), "addNewRangedWeapon", macro)] [H: macro = if(wpnNum == (listCount(wpnList)-3), "addNewImplement", macro)] [H: macro = if(delete && (wpnNum < (listCount(wpnList)-3)), "deleteItem", macro)] [H: weaponName = listGet(wpnList, wpnNum)] [H, if(wpnNum>= listcount(wpnlist)-3 && !delete), CODE:{[H:placeholder=1]}; {[H, if( !delete), CODE:{ [H: weapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, weaponName)][H: wpngroup = json.get(weapon, "WpnGroup")][H, if(wpngroup>=8): macro = "editItem"][H, if(wpngroup<=4): macro = "editMeleeItem"][H, if(wpngroup<=7 && wpngroup>=5):macro = "editRangedItem"]}] };] [MACRO(macro + "@Lib:Zaro"):weaponName]

  [IF(!HIDE_TOOLTIP), CODE: { };{};] {chosenAbilityName}: Rolled {result}. {if(!HIDE_TOOLTIP, "", "")}

Hit Bonus | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "tempBonusDmg | 0 | Temp. Dmg Bonus | TEXT | WIDTH=4", "Hattack | Main Hand, Main and Off Hand | Dual Weapons | RADIO | Orient=H Select=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastHattackTask",0), "Xattack | Single, Double, Triple | # of Attacks | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastXattackTask", 0), "Mattack | None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing | Melee Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastMattackTask", 0), "MDattack | None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing | Double Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastMDattackTask", 0), "MTattack | None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing | Triple Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastMTattackTask", 0), "MOattack | None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing | Offhand Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastMOattackTask", 0), "Rattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Ranged Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRattackTask", 0), "RDattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Double Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRDattackTask", 0), "RTattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Triple Attack Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastRTattackTask", 0), "ROattack | None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot | Offhand Option | RADIO |ORIENT=H SELECT=" + getStrProp(Private, "LastROattackTask", 0) )] [H: abort(status)]
<!-- Get Feats --> [H: tDoubleAttack = getStrProp(Feats, "DoubleAttack")] [H: tTripleAttack = getStrProp(Feats, "TripleAttack")] [H: tRapidStrike = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidStrike")] [H: tMightySwing = getStrProp(Feats, "MightySwing")] [H: tImprovedRapidStrike = getStrProp(Feats, " ImprovedRapidStrike")] [H: tBurstFire = getStrProp(Feats, "BurstFire")] [H: tRapidShot = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidShot")] [H: tWeaponFinesse = getStrProp(Feats, "WeaponFinesse")]
<!-- Get Weapon Stats --> [H: weapon = ""] [H: weaponName = listGet(wpnList, wpnNum)] [H, IF(json.isEmpty(weapon)): weapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, weaponName)] [H: name = json.get(weapon, "Name")] [H: dmgDice = json.get(weapon, "DmgDice")] [H: stunDice = json.get(weapon, "StunDice")] [H: dmgType = json.get(weapon, "DmgType")] [H: atk = json.get(weapon, "Atk")] [H: dmg = json.get(weapon, "Dmg")] [H: wpngroup = json.get(weapon, "WpnGroup")] [H, if(wpngroup<=4),CODE:{ [H: wpnfinesse = json.get(weapon, "WpnFinesse")] [H, if(wpnfinesse && tWeaponFinesse): usestat=DexBonus; usestat=StrBonus] [H: twohanded = json.get(weapon, "TwoHanded")] [H, if(twohanded):Dusestat=StrBonus*2; Dusestat=StrBonus] [H: rof =0] [H: CurrentAmmo=0] [H: maxAmmo=0] [H: attacktype=0]}; { [H: rof = json.get(weapon, "ROF")] [H: CurrentAmmo = json.get(weapon, "Ammo")] [H: maxAmmo = json.get(weapon, "Max Ammo")] [H: usestat=DexBonus] [H: Dusestat=0] [H: attacktype=1] };]
<!-- Get Offhand Weapon Stats --> [H: Oattacktype=0] [H, if(ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1), CODE:{ [H: Oweapon = ""] [H: OweaponName = listGet(ohList, ohNum)] [H, if(json.isEmpty(Oweapon)): Oweapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, OweaponName)] [H: Oname = json.get(Oweapon, "Name")] [H: OdmgDice = json.get(Oweapon, "DmgDice")] [H: OstunDice = json.get(Oweapon, "StunDice")] [H: OdmgType = json.get(Oweapon, "DmgType")] [H: Oatk = json.get(Oweapon, "Atk")] [H: Odmg = json.get(Oweapon, "Dmg")] [H: Orange = json.get(Oweapon, "Range")] [H: Owpngroup = json.get(Oweapon, "WpnGroup")] [H, if(Owpngroup<=4), CODE:{ [H: Owpnfinesse = json.get(Oweapon, "WpnFinesse")] [H, if(Owpnfinesse && tWeaponFinesse): Ousestat=DexBonus; Ousestat=StrBonus] [H: Otwohanded = json.get(Oweapon, "TwoHanded")] [H, if(Otwohanded):DOusestat=StrBonus*2;DOusestat=StrBonus] [H: Orof=0] [H: OCurrentAmmo=0] [H: OmaxAmmo=0] }; { [H: Orof = json.get(Oweapon, "ROF")] [H: OCurrentAmmo = json.get(Oweapon, "Ammo")] [H: OmaxAmmo = json.get(Oweapon, "Max Ammo")] [H: Ousestat=DexBonus] [H: DOusestat=0] [H: Oattacktype=1] }] }]
<!-- Save the selections for next time --> [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastAttackWeapon", wpnNum)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastOhWeapon", ohNum)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastHattackTask", Hattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastXattackTask", Xattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastMattackTask", Mattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastMDattackTask", MDattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastMTattackTask", MTattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastMOattackTask", MOattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRattackTask", Rattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRDattackTask", RDattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastRTattackTask", RTattack)] [H: Private = setStrProp(Private, "LastROattackTask", ROattack)]
[h:DisplayList=""] [h:OHsendList=""] [h:MDsendList=""] [h:MTsendList=""] [h:RDsendList=""] [h:RTsendList=""] [H: Option=""] [H: DOption=""] [H: TOption=""] [H: OHpen=0] [H: Datk=atk] [H: Tatk=atk] [H: Oatk=atk] [H: dmgdie=listGet(stringToList(DmgDice,"d"), 0)] [H: Ddmgdie=dmgdie] [H: Tdmgdie=dmgdie] [H: dmgdietype=listGet(stringToList(DmgDice,"d"), 1)] [H: Ddmgdietype=dmgdietype] [H: Tdmgdietype=dmgdietype] [H, if(ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1): Odmgdie=listGet(stringToList(OdmgDice,"d"), 0)] [H, if(ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1): Odmgdietype=listGet(stringToList(OdmgDice,"d"), 1)] [H, if(attacktype):CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-1]
<!-- Single, Double, Triple Attack --> [H, SWITCH(Xattack), CODE: case 0 : { [H:amt=0] [H:Option="Single Attack"] }; case 1 : {[H, if(tDoubleAttack), CODE:{ [H:amt=1] [H:atk=atk-5] [H:Datk=Datk-5] [H:Tatk=Tatk-5] [H:Oatk=Oatk-5] [H,if(attacktype):CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-1] [H:Option="Double Attack"] [H:DOption="Double Attack"]} ]}; case 2 :{[H, if(tTripleAttack), CODE:{ [H:amt=2] [H:atk=atk-10] [H:Datk=Datk-10] [H:Tatk=Tatk-10] [H:Oatk=Oatk-10] [H, if(attacktype):CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-2] [H:Option="Triple Attack"] [H:DOption="Triple Attack"] [H:TOption="Triple Attack"]} ]}; ]
<!-- Offhand Attack Options --> [H, if(Hattack && ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1), CODE:{ [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "Oattacktype", Oattacktype)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "Odmgdie", Odmgdie)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "Oatk", Oatk)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "OHpen", OHpen)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "Orof", Orof)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "OCurrentAmmo", OCurrentAmmo)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "MOattack", OHpen)] [h: OHsendList = setStrProp(OHsendList, "ROattack", Orof)] [OHsend(OHsendList)] [h:OHProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(OHProperties)] }]
<!-- Single Attack Mattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing --> [H, SWITCH(Mattack), CODE: case 1 : { [H ,if(tRapidStrike && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-2] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Rapid Strike"]} ] }; case 2 : { [H ,if(tImprovedRapidStrike && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+2] [H:Option=Option+ " Imp. Rapid Strike"]} ] }; case 3 : { [H ,if(tMightySwing && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Mighty Swing"]} ] }; default: {[H:atk=atk]}; ]
<!-- Double Attack MDattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing --> [H, IF(MDattack&&Xattack>=2), CODE:{ [h: MDsendList = setStrProp(MDsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: MDsendList = setStrProp(MDsendList, "Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)] [h: MDsendList = setStrProp(MDsendList, "Datk", Datk)] [h: MDsendList = setStrProp(MDsendList, "DOption", DOption)] [h: MDsendList = setStrProp(MDsendList, "MDattack", MDattack)] [MDsend(MDsendList)] [h:MDProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(MDProperties)] }]
<!-- Triple Attack MTattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing --> [H, IF(MTattack&&Xattack>=3), CODE:{ [h: MTsendList = setStrProp(MTsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: MTsendList = setStrProp(MTsendList, "Tdmgdie", Ddmgdie)] [h: MTsendList = setStrProp(MTsendList, "Tatk", Datk)] [h: MTsendList = setStrProp(MTsendList, "TOption", DOption)] [h: MTsendList = setStrProp(MTsendList, "MTattack", MDattack)] [MTsend(MTsendList)] [h:MTProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(MTProperties)] }]
<!-- Rattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, SWITCH(Rattack), CODE: case 1 : {[H, if((rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")&& attacktype ), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-9] [H:Option=Option+ " Auto-Fire"]} ]}; case 2 : {[H, if(tBurstFire && attacktype &&(rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+2] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-4] [H:Option=Option+ " Burst Fire"]} ]}; case 3 : {[H, if(tRapidShot && attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-2] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-1] [H:Option=Option+ " Rapid Shot"]} ]}; default: {[H:atk=atk]}; ]
<!-- Double Attack RDattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RDattack&&Xattack>=1), CODE:{ [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Datk", Datk)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "DOption", DOption)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "CurrentAmmo", CurrentAmmo)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "RDattack", RDattack)] [RDsend(RDsendList)] [h:RDProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RDProperties)] }]
<!-- Triple Attack RTattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RTattack && Xattack>=2), CODE:{ [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tdmgdie", Tdmgdie)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tatk", Tatk)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "TOption", TOption)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "CurrentAmmo", CurrentAmmo)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "RTattack", RTattack)] [RTsend(RTsendList)] [h:RTProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RTProperties)] }]

<!-- Get Passed Arguments -->

[h:varsFromStrProp(arg(0))]

<!-- Get Feats -->
[H: tBurstFire = getStrProp(Feats, "BurstFire")]
[H: tRapidStrike = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidStrike")]
[H: tMightySwing = getStrProp(Feats, "MightySwing")]
[H: tImprovedRapidStrike = getStrProp(Feats, " ImprovedRapidStrike")]
[H: tRapidShot = getStrProp(Feats, "RapidShot")]
[H: tDualWeaponMasteryI = getStrProp(Feats, "DualWeaponMasteryI")]
[H: tDualWeaponMasteryII = getStrProp(Feats, "DualWeaponMasteryII")]
[H: tDualWeaponMasteryIII = getStrProp(Feats, "DualWeaponMasteryIII")]	

[H, if(tDualWeaponMasteryI): OHpen=-5;OHpen=-10]
[H, if(tDualWeaponMasteryII): OHpen=-2]
[H, if(tDualWeaponMasteryIII): OHpen=0]
[H, if(Oattacktype): OCurrentAmmo=OCurrentAmmo-1]

[h:returnData = ""]

[H:Ooption="Offhand Attack"]
[H, SWITCH(MOattack), CODE:
	case 1 : {
		[H ,if(tRapidStrike && !Oattacktype), CODE:{
		[H:Oatk=Oatk-2]
		[H:Odmgdie=Odmgdie+1]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Rapid Strike"]}
		]
		};
	case 2 : {
		[H ,if(tImprovedRapidStrike && !Oattacktype), CODE:{
		[H:Oatk=Oatk-5]
		[H:Odmgdie=Odmgdie+2]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Imp. Rapid Strike"]}
		]
		};
	case 3 : {
		[H ,if(tMightySwing && !Oattacktype), CODE:{
		[H:Odmgdie=Odmgdie+1]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Mighty Swing"]}
		]
		};
	default: {[H:Oatk=Oatk]};
		]
[H, SWITCH(ROattack), CODE:
	case 1 : {[H, if((Orof=="A"||Orof=="S/A")&& Oattacktype ), CODE:{
		[H:Oatk=Oatk-5]
		[H:OCurrentAmmo=OCurrentAmmo-9]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Auto-Fire"]}
		]};
	case 2 : {[H, if(tBurstFire && Oattacktype &&(Orof=="A"||Orof=="S/A")), CODE:{
		[H:Oatk=Oatk-5]
		[H:Odmgdie=Odmgdie+2]
		[H:OCurrentAmmo=OCurrentAmmo-4]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Burst Fire"]}
		]};
	case 3 : {[H, if(tRapidShot && Oattacktype), CODE:{
		[H:Oatk=Oatk-2]
		[H:Odmgdie=Odmgdie+1]
		[H:OCurrentAmmo=OCurrentAmmo-1]
		[H:Ooption=Ooption+" Rapid Shot"]}
		]};
	default: {[H:Oatk=Oatk]};
		]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Oatk", Oatk)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Odmgdie", Odmgdie)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"OCurrentAmmo", OCurrentAmmo)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"OHpen", OHpen)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Ooption", Ooption)]
[h:macro.return = returnData]

<!-- Get Offhand Weapon Stats --> [H: Oattacktype=0] [H, if(ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1), CODE:{ [H: Oweapon = ""] [H: OweaponName = listGet(ohList, ohNum)] [H, if(json.isEmpty(Oweapon)): Oweapon = json.get(WeaponLibrary, OweaponName)] [H: Oname = json.get(Oweapon, "Name")] [H: OdmgDice = json.get(Oweapon, "DmgDice")] [H: OstunDice = json.get(Oweapon, "StunDice")] [H: OtripleCrit = json.get(weapon, "TripleCrit")] [H: OdmgType = json.get(Oweapon, "DmgType")] [H: Oatk = json.get(Oweapon, "Atk")] [H: Odmg = json.get(Oweapon, "Dmg")] [H: Orange = json.get(Oweapon, "Range")] [H: Owpngroup = json.get(Oweapon, "WpnGroup")] [H, if(Owpngroup<=4), CODE:{ [H: Owpnfinesse = json.get(Oweapon, "WpnFinesse")] [H, if(Owpnfinesse && tWeaponFinesse): Ousestat=DexBonus; Ousestat=StrBonus] [H: Otwohanded = json.get(Oweapon, "TwoHanded")] [H, if(Otwohanded):DOusestat=StrBonus*2;DOusestat=StrBonus] [H: Orof=0] [H: OCurrentAmmo=0] [H: OmaxAmmo=0] }; { [H: Orof = json.get(Oweapon, "ROF")] [H: OCurrentAmmo = json.get(Oweapon, "Ammo")] [H: OmaxAmmo = json.get(Oweapon, "Max Ammo")] [H: Ousestat=DexBonus] [H: DOusestat=0] [H: Oattacktype=1] }] }]

<!-- Single Attack Mattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. Rapid Strike, Mighty Swing --> [H, SWITCH(Mattack), CODE: case 1 : { [H ,if(tRapidStrike && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-2] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Rapid Strike"]} ] }; case 2 : { [H ,if(tImprovedRapidStrike && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+2] [H:Option=Option+ " Imp. Rapid Strike"]} ] }; case 3 : { [H ,if(tMightySwing && !attacktype), CODE:{ [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Mighty Swing"]} ] }; default: {[H:atk=atk]}; ]
<!-- Double Attack MDattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. <!-- Triple Attack MTattack None, Rapid Strike, Imp. <!-- Rattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot, Deadeye --> [H, SWITCH(Rattack), CODE: case 1 : {[H, if((rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")&& attacktype ), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-9] [H:Option=Option+ " Auto-Fire"]} ]}; case 2 : {[H, if(tBurstFire && attacktype &&(rof=="A"||rof=="S/A")), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-5] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+2] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-4] [H:Option=Option+ " Burst Fire"]} ]}; case 3 : {[H, if(tRapidShot && attacktype), CODE:{ [H:atk=atk-2] [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-2] [H:Option=Option+ " Rapid Shot"]} ]}; case 4 : {[H, if(tDeadeye && attacktype), CODE:{ [H:dmgdie=dmgdie+1] [H:Option=Option+ " Deadeye"]} ]}; default: {[H:atk=atk]}; ]
<!-- Double Attack RDattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RDattack&&Xattack>=1), CODE:{ [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "Datk", Datk)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "DOption", DOption)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "CurrentAmmo", CurrentAmmo)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RDsendList = setStrProp(RDsendList, "RDattack", RDattack)] [RDsend(RDsendList)] [h:RDProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RDProperties)] }]
<!-- Triple Attack RTattack None, Auto Fire, Burst Fire, Rapid Shot --> [H, IF(RTattack && Xattack>=2), CODE:{ [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tdmgdie", Tdmgdie)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "Tatk", Tatk)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "TOption", TOption)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "CurrentAmmo", CurrentAmmo)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "rof", rof)] [h: RTsendList = setStrProp(RTsendList, "RTattack", RTattack)] [RTsend(RTsendList)] [h:RTProperties=macro.return] [h:varsFromStrProp(RTProperties)] }]
[H, if(Oattacktype && ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1), CODE:{ [H:setBar("Ammo", OCurrentAmmo/Omaxammo)] [H:Oweapon = json.set(Oweapon, "Ammo", OCurrentAmmo)] [H:WeaponLibrary = json.set(WeaponLibrary, Oname, Oweapon)] }] [H, if(attacktype), CODE:{ [H:setBar("Ammo", CurrentAmmo/maxammo)] [H:weapon = json.set(weapon, "Ammo", CurrentAmmo)] [H:WeaponLibrary = json.set(WeaponLibrary, name, weapon)] }] <!-- Setup Primary attack display variables --> [h:dmgDice=dmgdie +"d"+ dmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "attacktype", attacktype)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "name", name)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", dmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tripleCrit", tripleCrit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "usestat", usestat)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "Dusestat", Dusestat)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "atk", atk)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusHit", tempBonusHit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "OHpen", OHpen)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", option)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmg", dmg)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgType", dmgType)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusDmg", tempBonusDmg)]
[R, if(amt>=0):DisplayAttack(DisplayList)]

[H ,if(amt>=2), CODE:{ [h: TdmgDice=Tdmgdie +"d"+ Tdmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", TdmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", Toption)]}] [R, if(amt>=2):DisplayAttack(DisplayList)]
[H, if(Hattack&& ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1), CODE:{ [h: OdmgDice=Odmgdie +"d"+ Odmgdietype] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "attacktype", Oattacktype)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "name", Oname)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgDice", OdmgDice)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tripleCrit", OtripleCrit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "usestat", Ousestat)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "Dusestat", DOusestat)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "atk", Oatk)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusHit", tempBonusHit)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "OHpen", OHpen)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "option", Ooption)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmg", dmg)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "dmgType", dmgType)] [h: DisplayList = setStrProp(DisplayList, "tempBonusDmg", tempBonusDmg)]}] [R, if(Hattack&& ohnum != listCount(ohList)-1):DisplayAttack(DisplayList)]

[H, SWITCH(RDattack), CODE:
	case 1 : {

		[H:Datk=Datk-5]
		[H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-9]
		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Auto-Fire"]}
		]};
	case 2 : {

		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Burst Fire"]}

	case 3 : {

		[H:Ddmgdie=Ddmgdie+1]
		[H:CurrentAmmo=CurrentAmmo-1]
		[H:DOption=DOption+ " Rapid Shot"]}
		]};
	default: {[H:Datk=Datk]};
]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Datk", Datk)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Ddmgdie", Ddmgdie)]
[h:returnData=setStrProp(returnData,"Doption", Doption)]

[H: success = input( "HPt|0|# Hit Points| TEXT | WIDTH=4", "HPtype|Healing, Damage, Ion Damage|Change Type|RADIO|SELECT=1", "tokenType|PC, NPC|Token Type|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT=" + if(isPC(), 0, 1), "junk|NPC=Limited chat info & coarse HP bar|NOTE:|LABEL" )] [H: abort(success)] [H: tokenType = if(tokenType == 1, "NPC", "PC")] [H: damage = if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2, 1, 0)] [H: HPt = if(HPtype == 0, abs(HPt), if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2, -1 * abs(HPt), 0))] [H: TempHP = TempHP + (damage*HPt)] [H: HPChange = if((HPt < 0), if(TempHP > 0, 0, TempHP ), HPt)] [H: reduceDMG = 0 ] [H, IF( DR != "" && HPtype == 1 ), CODE: { [ cancel = input( "junk|Damage Reduction exists!|drerx|LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "junk|" + abs(HPt) + "|Damage Taken|LABEL", "reduceDMG|0|Damage absorbed by DR|TEXT|WIDTH=4", "junk|DR " + DR + "|DR|LABEL|SPAN=TRUE" )] [H: abort(cancel)] }] [H: reduceDMG = abs( reduceDMG ) ] [H, if(HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2), CODE:{ [H, if(abs(HPChange) > CurrSR), CODE:{ [H: HPChange = HPChange + CurrSR + reduceDMG] [H, if(HPChange > 0): HPChange = 0] [H: CurrSR = CurrSR - 5] [H, if(CurrSR <= 0): CurrSR = 0] }; { [H:HPChange=0] };] }] [H, If(HPtype == 2), CODE:{ [H: FullIon = HPChange * -1] {HPChange} [H: HPChange = floor(HPChange * 0.5)] }; {[H: FullIon = 0]};] [H: CurrentHP = min(CurrentHP + HPChange,MaxHP)] [H: TempHP = max(0,TempHP)] [H, if(CurrentHP <0):CurrentHP=0] [H: TCondition = listFind(getLibProperty("CONDITION_LIST"), Condition)] [H: HPtest=abs(HPChange)] [H, if((HPtest >= Threshold) && (HPtype == 1)): TCondition = TCondition + 1] [H, if((CurrentHP == 0) && (HPtype == 1 || HPtype == 2)): TCondition = 5] [H, if((CurrentHP == 0) && (HPtype == 1) && (HPtest >= Threshold)): TCondition = 6] [H, if((FullIon >= Threshold) && (HPtype == 2)): TCondition = TCondition + 2] [MACRO("handleTokenHPStates@Lib:ZaroVehicles"):TCondition]
[R: if(HPt < 1, "", "Gained ")][R: HPChange ] hitpoints! [R: if(tokenType == "PC", "  " + CurrentHP + " / " + MaxHP + " Hitpoints.", "")] [R: if(tokenType == "PC" && SR >0, " " + CurrSR + " / " + SR + " Shield.", "")]

entry.string: "Kote, darasuum kote. Te racin kara juaan kote."

"Motir ca'tra nau tracinya.Gra'tua cuun hett su dralshy'a. Taung!
Motir ca'tra nau tracinya.Gra'tua cuun hett su dralshy'a. Aruetyc runi solus cet o'r prudii an.
Motir catra nau tracinya.Gratua cuun hett su dralshya. Aruetyc runi solus cet or.
Motir catra nau tracinya.Gratua cuun hett su dralshya.Aruetyc runi trattoko.
Sa kyr'am nau tracyn kad, Vode an!
Motir ca'tra nau tracinya.Gra'tua cuun hett su dralshy'a. Taung!
Bal kote, darasuum kote, Jorsoran kando a tome.Sa kyr'am nau tracyn kad, Vode an."

"Kote!
Kandosii sa ka'rta, Vode an.Manda'yaim a'den mhi, Vode an.
Bal kote, darasuum kote,Jorso'ran kando a tome.
Sa kyr'am nau tracyn kad, Vode an.
Kandosii sa ka'rta, Vode an.Manda'yaim a'den mhi, Vode an.
Bal...
Motir ca'tra nau tracinya.Gra'tua cuun hett su dralshy'a.Aruetyc runi cet slarycina solus cet o'r.
Motir ca'tra nau tracinya.Gra'tua cuun hett su dralshy'a.Aruetyc cet slarycina runi trattok'o.
Sa kyr'am nau tracyn kad, Vode an!"

Buy'ce gal, buy'ce tal
Vebor'ad" ures aliit
Mhi draar baat'i meg'parjii'se
Kote lo'shebs'ul narit."

net.rptools.maptool.model.LookupTable_-L.value:
{"name":"Ballistakinesis","ref":"L pg.53","rulesText":'

Ballistakinesis [Telekinetic]

You use the Force to spray an area with dangerous debris.
Time: Standard action. Targets: All targets in a 22 area (the entire area must be within 12 squares of you and in your line of sight).

Make a Use the Force check. Compare the result to the Reflex Defense of each target in the affected area. If the check result equals or exceeds the targets Reflex Defense, the target takes 3d8 points of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice) and takes a -2 penalty on all attack rolls until the start of your next turn. This is an area attack. Special: You may spend a Force Point when you activate this power, in which case targets whose Reflex Defense you fail to exceed with your skill check take half damage.

'}

{"name":"Battle Strike","ref":"SW pg.96","rulesText":'

Battle Strike

You use the Force to enhance your battle prowess.
Time: Swift action. Target: You.

Make a Use the Force check. The result of the check determines the effect, if any:
DC 15: Gain a +1 Force bonus on your next attack roll made before the end of your next turn and deal an additional 1d6 points of damage if the attack hits.
DC 20: As DC 15, except you deal an additional 2d6 points of damage.
DC 25: As DC 15, except you deal an additional 3d6 points of damage.
Special: You can spend a Force Point to deal an additional 2d6 points of damage on your next attack.

'}

{"name":"Blind","ref":"CW pg.50","rulesText":'

Blind [Telekinetic]

You hurl dirt, dust and debris at your foe, affecting its perception.
Time: Swift action. Target: One creature within 12 squares of you and in your line of sight.

Make a Use the Force check. Make one roll and compare the result to the targets Reflex Defense. If the result equals or exceeds the targets Reflex Defense, the target is considered flat-footed, and all other creatures have concealment from your target until the start of your next turn. Creatures that do not rely on eyesight to perceive (such as Miraluka) are immune to this effect. Special: You can spend a Force Point to use this power as a free action, instead of a swift action.

'}

{"name":"Cloak","ref":"CW pg.50","rulesText":'

Cloak

You can bend light around your body, rendering yourself invisible to anyone looking in your direction.
Target: Standard action. Target: You.
Make a Use the Force check. The result of the check determines the effect, if any:
DC 15: You are considered to have total concealment against all targets until the beginning of your next turn.
DC 20: As DC 15, and you gain a +2 Force bonus to Stealth checks until the beginning of your next turn.
DC 25: As DC 15, and you gain a +3 Force bonus to Stealth checks until the beginning of your next turn.
DC 30: As DC 15, and you gain a +4 Force bonus to Stealth checks until the beginning of your next turn.
Special: You can maintain the Cloak power from round to round, extending the normal duration. Maintaining the Cloak power is a Standard action, and you must make a new Use the Force check each round. If you take damage while maintaining this power, you must succeed on a Use the Force check (DC 15+ damage taken) to maintain the power. You can spend a Force point to increase the bonus to your Stealth checks by +5.

'}

{"name":"Combustion","ref":"FU pg.85","rulesText":'

Combustion

You use the Force to agitate particles in the air to create a pyrokinetic spray of sparks.
Time: Standard action. Targets: All targets in a 22 area (the entire area must be within 12 squares of you and in your line of sight).

Make a Use the Force check. Compare the result to the Fortitude Defense of each target in the affected area. If the check result equals or exceeds the targets Fortitude Defense, the target takes 4d6 points of fire damage and catches fire. If the attack misses, the target takes half damage and does not catch fire. This is an area attack. The result of your Use the Force check determines the attack bonus of the fire each round it burns. This replaces the fires normal attack bonus (see page 255 of the Saga Edition core rulebook).
Special: You can spend a Force Point to move one target hit by the power -1 step along the condition track.

'}

{"name":"Convection","ref":"FU pg.85","rulesText":'

Convection

You alter your body chemistry, causing your skin to burn with incredible heat.
Time: Swift action. Target: You.

Make a Use the Force check: The result of the check determines the effect, if any.
DC 15: Until the start of your next turn, all of your unarmed melee attacks deal +1d6 points of fire damage. Any target that takes fire damage also catches on fire (see page 255 of the Saga Edition core rulebook).
DC 20: As DC 15, except your melee attacks deal +2d6 points of fire damage.
DC 25: As DC 15, except your melee attacks deal +3d6 points of fire damage.
DC 30: As DC 15, except your melee attacks deal +4d6 points of fire damage.
Special: You can spend a Force Point to deal bonus fire damage to any creature that strikes you with an unarmed attack or makes a grab or grapple attack against you, for as long as the power is in effect. You can maintain convection from round to round, extending its normal duration. Maintaining the convection power is a swift action, and you must make a new Use the Force check each round. If you take damage while maintaining convection, you must succeed on a Use the Force check (DC = 15 + damage taken) to continue maintaining the power.

'}

{"name":"Corruption","ref":"SW pg.96","rulesText":'

Corruption [Dark Side]

You use the Force to send a bolt of pure dark side vileness into an enemy.
Time: Standard action. Target: One creature within 12 squares and within line of sight.

Make a Use the Force check: The result of the check determines the effect, if any. Compare the result to the targets Fortitude Defense. If the check result equals or exceeds the targets Fortitude Defense, the target is affected.
DC 15: The target takes 2d6 Force damage, and half that amount again at the start of its turn. If your Use the Force check equals or exceeds the targets Fortitude Defense by 5 or more, the target takes half that damage again in the following round.
DC 20: As DC 15, except the target takes 3d6 points of damage.
DC 25: As DC 15, except the target takes 4d6 points of damage.
DC 30: As DC 15, except the target takes 5d6 points of damage.
The target adds a size modifier to its Fortitude Defense: Colossal, +50, Gargantuan, +20, Huge, +10; Large, +5, Medium and smaller, +0.
Special: You can spend a Force Point when you successfully damage a target by using this power to have all creatures adjacent to the target take half this damage if the Use the Force check also exceeds their Fortitude Defense. These secondary targets do not take additional damage in the following round.

'}

{"name":"Crucitorn","ref":"JA pg.96","rulesText":'

Crucitorn

You can ignore the debilitating effects of physical pain and focus despite great physical trauma.
Time: Reaction (to an attack or Force power). Target: You.
Make a Use the Force check: The result of the check determines the effect, if any.
DC 15: you gain a +5 Force bonus to your damage threshold against any damage you take from the attack or Force power.
DC 20: As DC 15, except the Force bonus increases to +10.
DC 25: As DC 15, except the Force bonus increases to +15.
DC 30: As DC 15, except the Force bonus increases to +20.
Special: You can spend a Force Point to increase the bonus to your damage threshold by an additional +5.

'}

{"name":"Force Blast","ref":"JA pg. 96","rulesText":'

Force Blast

You use the Force to create a ball of compressed air and debris that you can hurl at enemy targets.
Time: Standard action. Target: One target within 12 squares and within line of sight.

Make a Use the Force check: Compare the result of your Use the Force check to the Reflex Defense of the target; if you exceed the targets Reflex Defense, you deal damage with the Force blast. The result of the Use the Force check determines the effect, if any.
DC 15: The Force blast deal 2d6 points of damage to the target.
DC 20: As DC 15, except you deal 3d6 points of damage.
DC 25: As DC 15, except you deal 4d6 points of damage.
DC 30: As DC 15, except you deal 5d6 points of damage.
Special: You can spend a Force point to add one-half your heroic level as a damage bonus on a Force blast just as you would with a normal weapon.

'}

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: abort(isGM())] [h: playerList = getAllPlayerNames()] [h: playerList = listDelete(playerList, listFind(playerList, getPlayerName() ) )]
[H: tokenList=getTokenNames()] [H: imgList = tokenList] [H: Num = listCount(imgList)] [h,COUNT(Num),CODE:{ [h:tokenName=listGet(imgList,roll.count)] [h,token(tokenName): image=getTokenImage()] [h:imgList=listReplace(imgList,roll.count,tokenName+" "+image)] }]
[h: whichTokenTabString = ""] [h: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + "WhichToken | " +imgList + " | Reveal whose information | LIST | SELECT=0 ICON=TRUE ICONSIZE=30"] [h: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + " ## " + "Text | Handout (click this) | Clickable text || TEXT"] [h: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + " ## " + "dispElement|Image,Portrait,Handout|Show Which Image | RADIO"]
[h: SendToTabString = ""] [h: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + "dummy | 'All Players' overrides individual player choices | Display to | LABEL"] [h: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "allPlayersCheck | 1 | All Players | CHECK"] [h: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "dummy | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | LABEL"] [h: playerNumber = 0] [h, foreach(tempPlayer, playerList), code: { [SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "playercheck"+playerNumber+" | 0 | " + tempPlayer + " | CHECK"] [h: playerNumber = playerNumber+1] }]
[H: success = input( "whichTokenTab | Info || TAB", whichTokenTabString, "sendToTab | SendTo || TAB", SendToTabString )] [H: abort(success)]
<!-- Link text --> [h: displaytext = macroLink(Text,"LibShowHandout@lib:Zaro","self","Element="+dispElement, listGet(tokenList, WhichToken))]
<!-- build json array with player names to send to, based on user input --> [h: jarr = ""] [h: playerNumber = 0] [h, foreach(tempPlayer, playerList), code: { [tempTicked = eval("playercheck"+playerNumber)] [IF(tempTicked): jarr = json.append(jarr, tempPlayer)] [playerNumber = playerNumber+1] }]
[IF(allPlayersCheck), code: {{displaytext} };
{[h, token(listGet(tokenList, WhichToken)): outputTo(jarr, displaytext)] [h: abort(0)]}; ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Handout
